name: Anti-Cube Portal
description: This module creates a damage amplification effect after shockwave hits, making shockwave attacks significantly more effective against affected enemies.

context_fields.when_to_use: When using shockwave mechanics and need enhanced damage output
context_fields.upgrade_priority: Focus on higher rarity versions for better multipliers
counter_strategies: Combines well with damage amplification effects
context_fields.resource_efficiency: High - significant damage boost for shockwave builds

unique_effect: Enemies take [x]x damage for 7s after they are hit by a shockwave.
